item.title: It's Hard to Edit Writing
item.description: It’s Hard to Edit Writing We have [[Loss Aversion]] while editing. We have difficulty really engaging with our own writing.

item.title: Art is Compressing History and Culture
item.description: Art is Compressing History and Culture See Also (See Also:: [[Art is Sex]]) (See Also:: [[Civilizations are remembered for their art]]) References

item.title: Never Give Up Until You Exhaust Every Option
item.description: Never Give Up Until You Exhaust Every Option SXSW with guards [[2022-07-20 Messages to Send to Thomas, Miriam, Alexa, and Teddy Regarding EA Blacklist]]

item.title: Normalize Living with Your Parents
item.description: Normalize Living with Your Parents You can save a lot by reducing housing costs.

item.title: My Model for the World
item.description: My Model for the World Ultimately, [[Welfarism]]. I want ideas to win (see [[Meme Theory]]) and that an ideal world that maximizes the good has a better distribution of people who hold certain ideas and act upon them.

item.title: When I Will Gossip
item.description: When I Will Gossip I used to refuse to gossip. I wanted to [[Give Everyone a First Impression]] There is now one new condition that has updated why I would gossip: [[Gossip Evolved as a Social Incentive for Alignment]].

item.title: Good Kids That Do Good Things Have Help
item.description: Good Kids That Do Good Things Have Help [[The Myth Of The “Self-Made” Billionaire - YouTube]]

item.title: The Reason I Fast is to Reduce Caloric Intake, Not Eat the same amount in a different time window
item.description: The Reason I Fast is to Reduce Caloric Intake, Not Eat the Same Amount in a Different Time Window

item.title: Cultural Appropriation
item.description: Cultural Appropriation Are we just salty that people are accepting? I feel like if I was to pick a world where people liked dumplings or didn’t , I would much rather have the first.

item.title: Limited Not By Typing Speed, but Thinking Speed
item.description: Limited Not By Typing Speed, but Thinking Speed

item.title: The US Thrives Off Inequality
item.description: The US Thrives Off Inequality Our averages suck, but a handful of innovators and inventors lead us to the top in tech How does shitty public schools lead to top rated universities and companies?

item.title: Republicans and Democrats Are Divided by Convenience, Not Ideological Consistency
item.description: Republicans and Democrats Are Divided by Convenience, Not Ideological Consistency If they were consistent, I would think Democrats would be pro choice and pro gun and Republicans pro life and anti gun.

item.title: We Are Rafts Passing in Life
item.description: We Are Rafts Passing in Life People float by to and fro. People come in and out of your life based off relevance, location, and many other factors.

item.title: We Should Make Marriage Opt In
item.description: We Should Make Marriage Opt In It avoids divorce being the last resort and being the boil over point This would mean that a lot of [[We Are Not Evolved for Long Term Pair Bonding Past 40 Years Old]] See [[We Are Rafts Passing in Life]]

item.title: I Would Like to Be My Child's Advisor
item.description: I Would Like to Be My Child’s Advisor Helping them along their way.

item.title: Nobody is Thinking About You. Everyone is Too Busy with Themselves to Think About You. Life is Lonely, but This is the Most Liberating Thing
item.description: Nobody is Thinking About You. Everyone is Too Busy with Themselves to Think About You. Life is Lonely, but This is the Most Liberating Thing
